meanings.definition: To shorten a word or phrase by omitting letters or sounds
meanings.sent1: In texting, people often abbreviate words to type faster.
meanings.sent2: Doctors abbreviate medical terms to communicate more efficiently.
meanings.sent3: She decided to abbreviate her name to make it easier for others to remember.
meanings.sent4: The code language abbreviated the message to keep it confidential.
meanings.sent5: Students learn to abbreviate long words in spelling exercises.
